name: WWDC: Why iCloud+ will help secure the enterprise
description: iCloud+ is an upgraded version of Apple's existing service that provides secure emailing and VPN-style security for users.

name: Asana adds features to reduce distractions, improve video chats
description: The work management platform focuses on fighting video fatigue with an asynchronous video tool that an analyst said could eventually see widespread adoption

name: OldOS app lets you pretend you're still using an iPhone 3G
description: Feeling nostalgic about the good old days of home buttons and bubbly icons? Well, there's a way to bring it all back.

name: Still going!
description: This will all be worth it in the end
